website_summaries.verdict: A very powerful stapler that is guaranteed to work through 500,000 staples.
pros: Features a flat staple option that helps hold papers tighter
Can hold 5,000 staples at one time
Able to staple through very thick projects
cons: You must use a staple cartridge with this model
It is not designed for standard staples

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Just received this stapler. Much better than the prior Stapler we use in our office. But stronger was well. Only thing I found disappointing is that it moves on the table when doing multiple stapling. I don't mind this based on the quality of this stapler.
customer_reviews.author: Norm

customer_reviews.title: Best Stapler/Seller ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have rarely been so pleased with a product or a seller. This stapler is fantastic! Smooth, quiet operation. Handles 70-80 page books without flinching. Worth every penny in a busy accountant's office (during tax season). We bought 2 and will likely buy more. And the ice cream on the cake...they arrived 4 days AHEAD of schedule! If I could give this product and this seller 10 stars, I would. Thank you, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, quite operations.
customer_reviews.text: Using in a CPA office setting. My admin person loves it. Works well and is very quite compared to previous units used. A bit pricey but hopefully will outlast the other brands that we have had to replace every couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RIP OFF!!
customer_reviews.text: Opened the package, plugged in and DOES NOT WORK!!! Stay far away from this seller! Pitiful product!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindi T. Cook

customer_reviews.title: you don't know it's there
customer_reviews.text: I have used Rapid staplers fot a long time. So I know they are good. I bought this one for bigger amounts of paper. But the big surprise was the noise. The old electric stapler gives every time a big bang. This one is very silent. Great stapler!
customer_reviews.author: Aloysius B. Heijst

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this stapler for a couple of months now, and I love it. I am able to staple big stacks of paper, whereas with my previous stapler was limited to 20 sheets. This stapler is worth the investment. So far, absolutely NO problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: At last a good stapler for lots of paper
customer_reviews.text: Having tried and discarded other heavy-duty electric staplers, at last here is one that really works. It is brisk, it really staples papers down close together, and there are no misstaplings that leave you looking for the pliers to pull a staple out that didnt go in properly. Very expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Senex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best stapler ever! Staples through 90 pages and never jams.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: must have for heavy use
customer_reviews.text: we staple over 100 times a day. this is our 2nd one of these, going to equip all desks with one. A powerhouse stapler. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Rapid Electric Stapler
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stapler! Do not waste your money on the Swingline. I have owned 3 Swinglines and the Rapid is easier to load knew cartridges and is much more consistent with stapling up to 80 sheets. If you need a high volume stapler for large stacks of paper get this one. It is used in our A/E office of 100 employees and we frequently staple large stacks of drawings.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Smith

customer_reviews.title: This top of the line !
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a stapler that actually does what it claims ! Works great in a busy accounting office ! Staples nice thick bundles and staples are easy to remove without destroying the pages !
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best Stapler on the planet. Staples flat so it works with folding machins
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Best stapler
customer_reviews.text: Amazing stapler! Very durable and works as fast as you want. Install was very easy as well. The stapler has a carrying capacity of 5000 staples which is a lot. The cartridge is included but I bought a spare from amazon just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Product Review: Rapid® - 5080e Heavy-Duty Flat Clinch Electric Stapler, 90-Sheet Capacity
customer_reviews.text: This might be a bit to early to rate this stapler since I just got it, and haven't used it all that much here in the office just yet, but what I'll say is, so far it's been great, love it as of right now, just from the little bit of experience of stapling with it. I've got a feeling that I'm going to continue to love it but I'll just have to waiting and see over time. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie W Martin JR

customer_reviews.title: DONT Buy
customer_reviews.text: This was the 2nd one of these I purchased for my office. Both have had issues with jamming and not working. The 2nd one was new out of the box and lasted 3 days. I wanted to send back. NO all they will do is let me send it to the repair center. For $350 plus $$'s this should last for years and never need any repair.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Dotson

customer_reviews.title: i love this one
customer_reviews.text: after 4 years of using swingline heavy duty staplers which i had to have replaced by the manufacturer every 4 to 6 months i am thrilled with this stapler. it doesn't jam, and has been performing amazingly well. can't be any happier.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Krempasky

customer_reviews.title: Awesome heavy-duty stapler!
customer_reviews.text: This stapler lives up to its billing. Handles thick document packages with ease, much more efficiently than a manual version. What used to be a tedious and annoying task with a large manual stapler has become a job the entire office enjoys!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of replacing the lesser electric staplers. We now use 3 of these and have never needed to replace any.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE STAPLER
customer_reviews.text: SATISFIED...VERY NICE PRODUCT IT WORKS RATHER NICELY AND IS LIGHT I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT THIS IS A VERY QUIET STAPLER - A NICE SURPRISE
customer_reviews.author: DIANE CAMPBELL

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Stapler
customer_reviews.text: perfect for our needs! We needed a stapler that stapled bigger piles of paper, and this one does the trick great!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Suits purpose it was purchased for
customer_reviews.text: It effortlessly stitched 25 sheets of 250gsm board which other Heavy Duty (non-electric) staplers I had purchased, failed to do. Very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: No quality control
customer_reviews.text: This stapler is outrageously expensive and the one that I got had an obvious defect. The striker plate was skewed by 20 degrees making it unusable. I strongly suggest you do not buy this stapler because the quality control is non existent.
customer_reviews.author: F. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Consider an Alternate Buyer
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these, one has performed outstandingly, the other has continuosly had issues with handling the cartridge and coming apart. Worst part is the warranty help has been some of the worst I have ever dealt with....Sorry
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Pollard

customer_reviews.title: DOA, Returning for Refund
customer_reviews.text: Stapler was DOA... No LED light, no stapling. Returning for refund
customer_reviews.author: kohms

customer_reviews.title: So far this stapler has been great, and is used daily
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this stapler to replace an old one that quit working in our office. After reading many reviews of different brands, I chose the Rapid 5080e because of its stapling capacity and reliability. So far this stapler has been great, and is used daily. It is easy to use, is easily adjusted, isn't loud, and staples thick documents with no problem. The cartridge is very easy to change when it runs out---which will be a long time from now, as it has 5,000 staples in each cartridge. All in our office agree that this was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KBL

customer_reviews.title: We had been going through (destroying beyond repair) standard staplers at a rate of about 1 per week so we hoped this would be a
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for a busy college computer lab. We had been going through (destroying beyond repair) standard staplers at a rate of about 1 per week so we hoped this would be a better deal over time. 5 years later and it just died and we are ordering a new one. We have gone through hundreds of cartridges and we more than got our monies worth out of it. We did destroy one power supply that is the only reason for the 4 instead of 5 stars. I will confirm what others have said it is very quiet for what it does and how thick of a stack it can do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Stapler Ever!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best electric stapler. Staples almost anything with ease. Definitely worth the money; as someone with arthritis of the hands this has not only made me more efficient, but made my job also less painful.
customer_reviews.author: CMHEIGHTS

customer_reviews.title: very very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I use this same stapler at my job which requires a lot of stapling. I have never had any problems with it. I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: paige

product_meta.title: Rapid 5080e Professional Electric Stapler (90147)
product_meta.description: Designed for over 500,00 stapling operations. 90 Sheet capacity. 5,000 staples without reloading. Quiet and low vibration system. LED low staple and safety indicator. Flat clinch technology.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars47 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
